text: N’igihe basomewe aya majambo y’Imana matagatifu yacu ari k’umugaragaro baca bavuga bati:- ntiyari kuba uyo Muhammadi (aui) atari uko ari umuntu ashaka kuba kingira hamwe nivyo bahora basenga abavyeyi banyu, nabo bishura bati:- ntivyari kuba ibi vyose atari ububeshi bwadutse giturumbuka, n’abahakanye Imana y’ukuri babwira ukuri kwabashikiye bati:- ibi vyose ntivyari kuba atari uko ari uburozi buri k’umugaragaro
